rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0001
rows.name:
The children of Luxuria are raised
not with lullabies, but with the epics
of Adel.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0002
rows.name:
So we were painfully aware of the
threat that the Holy Grail poses us.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0003
rows.name:
We feared that her return may wreak
devastation upon our world.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0004
rows.name:
But we realize now that we
misunderstood.

rows.label: tlk006301_06_msg0005
rows.name:
Her rightful place is with you. You
must wrest her from Iira's grasp
by any means necessary.
